description: This is an advanced contract award notice (ACAN) for the provision of a community residential facility (CRF) in the community of Peterborough, Ontario. The successful bidder must have at least 2 years of experience in providing accommodation services to adult offenders in a residential setting, and must demonstrate experience in managing the behaviour of offenders in accordance with the Correctional Service of Canada's (CSC) policies and procedures. The bidder selected for contract award will be the one that best meets the minimum requirements outlined in this notice of public contract award.
full_summary:
**Community Residential Facility (CRF) - John Howard Society of Peterborough**

**Contract Reference:** PW-22-01008710
**Posting Date:** September 29, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** October 19, 2022
**Estimated Value:** CAD 1,038,352.00

**Project Overview:**

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a Community Residential Facility (CRF) to provide residential services to adult offenders released to the community on conditional release, statutory release, or subject to a Long-Term Supervision Order.

**Objectives:**

- Provide accommodation, monitoring, general support, and assistance to offenders
- Assist offenders to successfully reintegrate into the community as law-abiding citizens

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Provide 24-hour residential services to adult offenders
- Offer meals that meet health and nutritional requirements
- Develop a Resident Action Plan and monitor and support offender activities
- Assist offenders in areas such as crisis management, education, employment, and life skills
- Provide referral services to community support groups and other agencies

**Security Requirements:**

- Hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and obtain approved Document Safeguarding Capability at the level of PROTECTED B
- Ensure personnel require access to PROTECTED information or assets hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS

**Qualification and Experience:**

- Minimum 2 years experience working with adult offenders on conditional release
- Minimum 2 years experience providing accommodation to offenders in a residential setting

**Statement of Capabilities:**

Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the goods and services described in this Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN) may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice on or before the closing date and time of this notice.

**Closing Date and Time:**

October 19, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT

**Contact Information:**

Danielle Cameron, Manager/Team Leader, Contracting and Materiel Services
Phone: (343) 542-9350
Email: Danielle.Cameron@csc-scc.gc.ca
